welcome_message_body: Welcome to Palmers Green, a charming and vibrant neighborhood in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its beautiful parks, quaint cafes, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving primarily Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow, with a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Home to many SkyTeam airlines, including Air France and KLM.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow, serving British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to the needs of private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal that serves mainly low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport serves mainly low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Free for 4 hours, then a fee applies.
